Text: Thank you for this upload and all the others you have shared in the past.  I would not be able to see HD versions of these shows if it weren't for you.

thank you sceneline! immerse, what is wrong with your recording/encoding equipment, the last two episodes of nikita was skipping, and the walking dead episodes was jagged/stuttering. I like these shows, but the other groups run with a lot higher quality than you. how come? otherwise, thanks to you too. I dont mean to be a troll, just trying to give some constructive criticism.
